name: Minimal Mode
author: Elysium Team
description: A comprehensive theming plugin demonstrating all available Token APIs. Customize styling, layout, and positioning of UI elements.

settings.label: Accent Color
settings.description: Primary accent color for buttons, selection highlights, links, and interactive elements throughout the app.

settings.label: Button Shape
settings.description: Shape of floating action buttons (Quick Entry, Calendar, Notes) in the bottom menu bar on iOS.

settings.label: Card Shape
settings.description: Shape of list item cards (Goals, Tasks, Reminders, etc.) in the sidebar list views.

settings.label: Chip Shape
settings.description: Shape of status chips (Active, Completed, etc.) and tags shown on list items.

settings.label: Button Backgrounds
settings.description: Show background behind floating buttons. When off, buttons appear as icons only.

settings.label: Card Backgrounds
settings.description: Show background on list item cards. When off, cards blend into the list background.

settings.label: Show Shadows
settings.description: Enable shadow and glow effects on cards, buttons, and focused elements.

settings.label: Shadow Radius
settings.description: Blur radius for shadows when enabled. Higher values create softer, more diffuse shadows.

settings.label: Background Opacity
settings.description: Opacity of card and container backgrounds (0-100%). Lower values make backgrounds more transparent.

settings.label: Sidebar Width
settings.description: Width of the left sidebar list panel on iPad and macOS (in points).

settings.label: Button Size
settings.description: Size of floating action buttons in the bottom menu bar (in points).

settings.label: Icon Size
settings.description: Size of icons within buttons and list items (in points).

settings.label: Corner Radius
settings.description: Rounded corner radius for cards, buttons, and containers. 0 = square corners.

settings.label: Spacing
settings.description: Standard spacing between elements in lists and layouts (in points).

settings.label: Row Height
settings.description: Minimum height of list rows for Goals, Tasks, Reminders, etc. (in points).

settings.label: Hour Height
settings.description: Height of each hour block in calendar day/week views (in points). Affects event density.

settings.label: Quick Entry Position
settings.description: Position of the Quick Entry (natural language input) button. Choose 'Hidden' to remove it.

settings.label: Floating Button Position
settings.description: Default position for all floating action buttons (Calendar, Notes, etc.). Choose 'Hidden' to remove them.

settings.label: Toolbar Position
settings.description: Position of the main toolbar. Note: Not all views support all positions.

settings.label: Liquid Glass Effect
settings.description: Enable iOS 26+ liquid glass blur effect on cards and overlays. Requires iOS 26+.

settings.label: Monochrome Icons
settings.description: Render all status icons in a single color (your accent color) instead of their default colors.

settings.label: Disable Glow Effects
settings.description: Turn off all glow/highlight effects on focused elements and priority indicators.
